Charlotte was the Witch form of Nagisa Momoe in past timelines and worlds. Assuming a seemingly harmless and cute form at first, she lured unsuspecting Magical Girls to reckless assaults with her appearance of helplessness. However, once this initial form was attacked enough, her true, monstrous form would emerge. Charlotte was capable of killing Mami Tomoe -- a veteran and powerful Magical Girl -- in a single bite. (Though she certainly took more than just one bite out of her.)[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While Nagisa is back to her old Magical Girl self, stories of Charlotte persist in this world, and the image of Charlotte's true form is one which brings terror to those who know the story.
This building may only be obtained by enacting a Decision as Nagisa Momoe.
